step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance.
Excellent! You're stretching your arm overhead. Remember to maintain that stretch throughout the movement.
Great! Open your palm and fingers wide. This prepares you for the pumping action.
Well done! Make a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles. Focus on the squeezing action.
Good start on your second repetition. Keep that arm extended overhead and feel the stretch.
Nicely done extending your arm overhead. Maintain this position as you prepare to pump.
Perfect! Open your hand and fingers wide. This is key for effective lymph movement.
Fantastic! You made a tight fist while inhaling. Keep visualizing the fluid moving out.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the stretch. Make sure to open your hand wide and then make a tight fist while inhaling. Continue to visualize fluid moving out of your arm.
